result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deonta Rawls

records.descr: Notice and acknowledge of def voting ineligibility

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on November 7, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

10:16 AM Defendant Deonta Rawls appeared by video in custody at MJTC.  Attorney Jessica Fehrenbach appeared by video for Deonta Rawls.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew R Polzin in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case called appearances given.  Victim rights are complied with Victim is not present.  Court addresses the parties as to the status of the case.  Discovery  has been received.  Offer has been completed by the State.  Defense did receive the offer.  Need to set for a plea and sentencing.  Paperwork needs to be complete in advance and filed with the Court.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on October 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
No contact with victim T.C except for incidental contact through victims employment

Return to Sender / Refused / Unable to Forward
Preliminary Hearing on 7-29-22 at 1:15 p.m.

Return to Sender / Vacant / Unable to Forward
Notice of Assignment of Judge

1:17 PM - case called.  Defendant Deonta Rawls appeared by video, in custody from the MJTC.  Attorney Jessica Fehrenbach appeared by video for Deonta Rawls.  Attorney Kristopher R Ellis in court for State of Wisconsin.  State has complied with victim rights.  Court questions if there are any victims appearing that wish to be heard - no response.  Sgt. Investigator Kevin Orzech duly sworn and testifies.  Direct by Atty Ellis.  Defendant identified by Sgt. Investigator Orzech.  State requests the Court take judicial notice of the bond in Waukesha County Case No. 21CF217.  Court takes judicial notice.  Cross by Atty Fehrenbach.  Court finds probable cause that a felony has been committed and binds the Defendant over for further proceedings.  Information filed with the Court.  In receipt - waive reading - plea of not guilty.  Court accepts not guilty plea.  Bond will continue.  Atty Fehrenbach will file a request for Substitution of Judge.  Statement by the Court - further court proceedings to be scheduled with the new Judge.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on July 29, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: No contact with victim T.C except for incidental contact through victims employment

10:17 AM  Prosecuting attorney Kristopher R Ellis in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Deonta Rawls appeared by video in custody from MJTC.  In receipt of complaint.  Court reads complaint to defendant.  Right to counsel.   Defendant would like counsel.  Defendant wants the preliminary hearing within 20 days.  District will have to assign a new judge to this case.  Preliminary hearing to be put on - on or before August 11th. Court gives social worker the phone number for PD office.
Scheduling conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 08:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:36 PM Prosecuting attorney Galen Bayne-Allison in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Deonta Rawls appeared by video, in custody. at MJTC  Case called appearances given.  Court questions the deft.  Deft has not received the complaint.  Court to adjourn.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.
